alert.note: Alert for Graham; Pima; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 4:50PM MST until September 21 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... West central Graham County in southeastern Arizona... Southeastern Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 530 PM MST. * At 450 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oracle, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Catalina, Oracle, Mammoth, Saddlebrooke, San Manuel, Dudleyville, Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness, Campo Bonito, Biosphere 2 and Klondyke. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
